page.title: 14Tiptree Book Service
page.content: The Tiptree Book Service is near to St. Lukes School. My dad, who works there said:- He had worked there 16 years. He enjoys his job and starts at 8.00a.m. and finishes at 5.00p.m. "Do you think you'd get another job?" If I am made redundant. Then we went to see Tom Calaby. We asked him questions about his job. The first questions we asked were:- What is your job? He replied I am a book binder. Do you work with machines? He answered yep. He works at Hutchinsons of Tiptree. We asked if more men worked there than women? Rather puzzled he replied no. Do you think there will be changes? Already we've had a change-a new manager. He is American.
